Title: Planning Manager
Company: Công ty Cổ phần Xây dựng Vilai Việt
Location: 9F, TSQ-Millennium Building, No.4 Quang Trung, Yet Kieu Ward, Ha Dong District, Ha Noi City, xã Sông Khoai, Thị xã Quảng Yên, Quảng Ninh, Việt Nam, Hai Phong, Vietnam, Tầng 9, tòa tháp Thiên Niên Kỷ, số 4 Quang Trung, Yết Kiêu, Hà Đông, Hà Nội
Job Description:
Duties and Responsibilities
• Develop comprehensive project plans, including detailed schedules, resource allocation, and cost projections, utilizing project management software (e.g., Primavera P6, MS Project).
• Collaborate closely with project managers, engineers, architects, subcontractors, and other stakeholders to deﬁne project objectives, scope, and timelines.
• Break down large construction projects into manageable phases and tasks, establishing logical sequences and critical paths.
• Monitor project progress against the baseline plan, identify potential delays or risks, and develop proactive mitigation strategies.
• Prepare and present regular progress reports, including schedule updates, variance analysis, and potential impact assessments, to project teams and stakeholders.
• Analyze contractor and subcontractor schedules and related documents for compliance with project objectives and contractual requirements.
• Track and manage changes to the project schedule, ensuring proper documentation and communication to all relevant parties.
• Develop and maintain resource allocation plans, ensuring efficient utilization of labor, equipment, and materials.
• Work with the cost control team to integrate schedules with budget forecasts and monitor cost performance.
• Conduct site visits as needed to gather progress data and verify schedule adherence.
• Participate in project meetings to provide schedule insights and contribute to problem-solving.
• Assist in the evaluation of potential claims for time extensions and provide schedule-related analysis.
• Contribute to the development and improvement of planning and scheduling procedures and best practices within the organization.
Job Requirements:
• Fluent in English
• Proven experience as a planning manager (from 10 years of experience)
• A bachelor's degree in civil engineering, Construction Management, or a related field.
• Having Project Management Professional (PMP) Certificate
• Strong knowledge of construction processes, materials, and design principles.
• Excellent project management and organizational skills.
• Proficiency in design software (e.g., AutoCAD, Revit, SketchUp).
• Ability to interpret technical drawings and specifications.
• Strong communication and interpersonal skills. Strong proficiency in project management software such as Primavera P6 and Microsoft Project.
• Excellent understanding of construction methodologies, sequencing, and critical path analysis.
• Solid analytical and problem-solving skills with the ability to identify and resolve schedule-related issues.
• Exceptional organizational and time management skills, with the ability to prioritize tasks and meet deadlines.
• Strong communication and interpersonal skills, with the ability to effectively collaborate with diverse teams and stakeholders.
• Familiarity with contract terms and conditions related to project schedules.

Benefits
• Salary: Salary is based on candidate experience.
• Pay Range: $1200 minimum
• Social insurance
• Project coefficient (long-distance project allowance)
• Other Allowances: Meals, Accommodation, Cost of Living
• Summer vacation, Team Building
• Health Check
• Annual incentives and Incentives according to the capacity and contribution efforts of personnel

Title: MEP Manager
Company: Công ty Cổ phần Xây dựng Vilai Việt
Location: xã Sông Khoai, Thị xã Quảng Yên, Quảng Ninh, Việt Nam, 9F, TSQ-Millennium Building, No.4 Quang Trung, Yet Kieu Ward, Ha Dong District, Ha Noi City, Hai Phong, Vietnam, Tầng 9, tòa tháp Thiên Niên Kỷ, số 4 Quang Trung, Yết Kiêu, Hà Đông, Hà Nội
Job Description:
We seek a knowledgeable MEP Manager to be responsible for leading the implementation of mechanical, electrical, and plumbing systems for various construction projects.
Our ideal candidate collaborates with architects, engineers, and contractors to ensure the successful delivery of MEP systems that meet project specifications, codes, and standards.

Duties and Responsibilities
• Develop an MEP master plan for the project.
• Manage the progress of MEP work, ensure the set schedule
• Review and approval of MEP system design drawings
• Inspection of construction quality according to current standards and regulations
• Coordination between MEP teams and other relevant departments in the project
• Supervise the implementation of MEP systems at the construction site.
• Track and manage budgets for MEP activities, ensuring cost optimization
• Ensure MEP systems comply with occupational safety and environmental protection regulations
• Prepare periodic reports on the status of implementation, detection, and resolution.
Job Requirements:
• Fluent in English
• Have at least 10 years of equivalent experience in Grade I projects
• Bachelor’s degree in mechanical engineering, Electrical Engineering, or related disciplines.
• In-depth knowledge of the MEP system and technical regulations and industry standards.
• Proficient in engineering software such as AutoCAD, Revit MEP
• Good leadership, problem-solving, and communication skills.
• Ability to work under high pressure, responsibly and proactively
• Able to work on projects according to the company's dispatch.

Benefits
• Salary: Salary is based on candidate experience, qualifications.
• Pay Range: $1200 minimum
• Social insurance
• Project coefficient
• Other Allowances: Meals, Accommodation, Cost of Living.
• Summer vacation, Team Building
• Health Check
• Annual incentives and Incentives according to the capacity and contribution efforts of personnel

Title: Sr. Product Owner - Digital ID & Payments
Company: Trusting Social
Location: Tầng 8, Havana Tower - 132 Hàm Nghi, P. Bến Thành, Q.1, TP.HCM, Havana Tower, 132, Ham Nghi Str., Ben Thanh Ward, Dist. 1, HCMC
Job Description:
Trusting Social is the leading Digital Identity & Payment Authentication service provider for the Banking & Financial sector in Vietnam, Indonesia, Philippines, and India, boasting over 30 existing clients, including banks, financial companies, and e-wallets. Our TrustVision solutions empower clients to onboard customers digitally anytime and anywhere, detect fraud, and enable secure transactions using advanced facial recognition and AI models.

How you will make an impact in this role
As a Senior Product Owner in Digital Identity & Payment Authentication Product at Trusting Social, you will participate in decision-making and prioritization to drive product strategy, roadmap, and development, addressing identity trust in the financial sector in Vietnam and other Trusting Social markets. You will have the ultimate responsibility for implementing product features that deliver world-class Digital Identity/eKYC. Your role will involve delivering next-generation Digital Identity & Payment Authentication product offerings to our clients and playing a key role in ideating and co-creating new features tailored to Trusting Social's clients and market needs.
If you're genuinely passionate about building world-class Digital Identity & Payment Authentication products and never settling for second place, join us on a journey of discovery to solve problems and deliver excellence.

What you will do
- Understand market needs and customers' pain points, stay updated on market trends, participate in creating a compelling product vision, and develop a product roadmap quarterly and annually.
- Obsess over customers to deliver the products they need, constantly study the products to understand every aspect and fine-tune them to meet customer needs.
- Proactively engage in the end-to-end product cycle of research, development, testing, deployment, and improvement.
- Engage with clients and users to gather constant feedback and incorporate it into the product features.
- Use data to understand product and feature performance, and suggest data-driven initiatives to improve the product and user experience.
- Collaborate closely with Data Scientists and Product Managers to build a data-informed product roadmap.
- Use data and client feedback to identify new fraud schemes. Advise clients with tailored use cases based on data and testing outcomes.
- Provide expert opinions for enhancements/improvements of the product suite provided to clients.
- Collaborate with Data Scientists and Engineers to ensure smooth and proper production implementation.
- Manage data collection for product performance tracking and improvement.
- Support sales in pitching and deployment for customers.
Job Requirements:
Minimum
- 3+ years of experience in product management along with 5+ years of overall work experience
- Experience in SaaS/B2B product development
- Technical background with a degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or a related field
- Ability to collect and analyze data from various sources, identify key insights, spot product opportunities, and inform product decisions
- Willingness to roll up your sleeves and do whatever it takes to help your team win
- Ability to maintain a keen attention to detail, multitask, and work well under pressure
- Good interpersonal skills
- Teamwork and hardworking with enthusiastic attitudes
- Strong learning ability and self-motivation to acquire new knowledge
- Capability to zoom in and out on a problem
- Effective problem-solving skills under pressure

Preferred
- Proven track record in Product Management

Excellent candidates

- Extreme ownership is without a doubt, working for the love of it, leading the team to help millions of lives.

Company: Công Ty TNHH HOME & Health MH VINA

Job Description:
• Planning, coordinating and managing all phases of construction projects, including project initiation, planning, execution, monitoring and closeout.
• Establishing project objectives, scope and deliverables in collaboration with stake holders and ensuring alignment with client requirements.
• Developing and managing project schedules, budgets and resource allocations to ensure cost efficiency and timely delivery.
• Liaising with architects, engineers, contractors and subcontractors to monitor construction progress, resolve issues and ensure compliance with specifications and quality standards.
• Managing procurement processes, including bid evaluations, contract negotiations and vendor selection.
• Oversee project budgeting and cost control and manage change orders to ensure adherence to budgetary constraints.
• Conducting regular site inspections to assess project progress, identify risks, and ensure compliance with safety protocols and regulatory requirements.
• Maintain effective communication with project team members and stakeholders to provide project updates, address concerns and foster strong working relationships.
Job Requirements:
• A bachelor's degree in civil engineering, construction management, or a related field.
• 10 + years of relevant experience in construction project management, with a track record of successfully delivering projects on time and within budget.
• Strong knowledge of construction methodologies, building codes and safety regulations in the Vietnam context.
• Excellent project management skills, including effective planning, organizing and prioritizing tasks.
• Proficiency in reading and interpreting technical documents, including project blueprints and construction schematics.
• Strong leadership and communication skills to manage project teams and stakeholders.
• Proficiency in construction management software, project scheduling tools and cost estimation software. Proficiency in using AutoCAD, Excel, Gantt chart or MicroSoft Project
• English Language Communication skills is preferred.

Title: Giám Đốc Kinh Doanh Kênh MT & GT
Company: Tập Đoàn Karofi Holding
Location: Lim Tower 2, 62A Cách Mạng Tháng 8, phường 6, Quận 3, Thành phố Hồ Chí Minh, Việt Nam, Tầng 6, Tòa nhà Hudland, Số 6 Nguyễn Hữu Thọ, Hoàng Mai, Hà Nội, Tầng 7 - Hudland Tower - Số 6 Nguyễn Hữu Thọ - Hoàng Liệt - Hoàng Mai - Hà Nội
Job Description:
Để phục vụ cho chiến lược phát triển kinh doanh trong giai đoạn mới cho nhóm ngành sản phẩm Điện máy, Gia dụng,... Tập đoàn Karofi thông báo chiêu mộ anh chị ứng viên cho vị trí Giám đốc Kinh doanh MT, GT (RSM) với nhiệm vụ chính là chịu trách nhiệm toàn diện trong việc xây dựng chiến lược kinh doanh, tổ chức triển khai, kiểm soát hoạt động bán hàng và phát triển đội ngũ nhằm đạt được các mục tiêu doanh số, độ phủ và tăng trưởng bền vững của kênh MT hoặc GT.


I. MÔ TẢ CÔNG VIỆC:
- Chiến lược và kế hoạch kinh doanh:
+ Xây dựng chiến lược phát triển kênh MT hoặc GT phù hợp với mục tiêu trung và dài hạn của công ty.
+ Thiết lập kế hoạch kinh doanh theo tháng, quý, năm cho từng nhóm sản phẩm và từng khu vực phụ trách.
+ Xây dựng chính sách bán hàng, chương trình chiết khấu, hỗ trợ đối tác theo từng kênh.
- Quản lý kênh phân phối:
+ Đàm phán, ký kết hợp đồng và duy trì mối quan hệ với các đối tác chiến lược như hệ thống siêu thị (MT) hoặc nhà phân phối/đại lý (GT).
+ Tối ưu hệ thống phân phối để mở rộng độ phủ sản phẩm toàn thị trường.
+ Giám sát công nợ và hỗ trợ bộ phận tài chính trong việc kiểm soát dòng tiền.
- Phát triển đội ngũ bán hàng:
+ Tuyển dụng, đào tạo, phát triển và đánh giá hiệu quả đội ngũ kinh doanh.
+ Thiết lập KPI và lộ trình phát triển cho từng vị trí trong kênh.
+ Truyền cảm hứng và xây dựng văn hóa hiệu suất cao trong đội ngũ.
- Phối hợp nội bộ và triển khai chương trình hỗ trợ bán hàng:
+ Kết hợp chặt chẽ với phòng Marketing để triển khai các chương trình khuyến mãi, trưng bày, truyền thông tại điểm bán.
+ Phối hợp với các phòng ban khác như R&D, CSKH, Supply Chain… để đảm bảo chuỗi cung ứng và trải nghiệm khách hàng tối ưu.
- Phân tích và cải tiến:
+ Theo dõi chặt chẽ kết quả kinh doanh theo từng khu vực, cửa hàng, nhóm sản phẩm.
+ Phân tích thị trường, đối thủ, xu hướng tiêu dùng để điều chỉnh chính sách bán hàng kịp thời.
+ Đề xuất các giải pháp cải tiến liên tục để tăng trưởng hiệu quả và tối ưu chi phí.

II. QUYỀN LỢI:
- Mức thu nhập thỏa thuận, bao gồm lương cứng và các khoản thưởng kinh doanh, thưởng chung theo chính sách công ty.
- Sản phẩm có chất lượng tốt, uy tín và cạnh tranh cao. Chiến lược phát triển bền vững và chuyên nghiệp.
- Đội ngũ Ban Lãnh đạo có tầm nhìn xa, tham vọng phát triển mạnh mẽ; có sự thấu hiểu thị trường và hoạt động phát triển kinh doanh.
- Môi trường làm việc trẻ, luôn hướng tới phát triển cá nhân tổ chức, cùng rất nhiều chương trình văn hóa doanh nghiệp tới cán bộ nhân viên (teambuilding, hội thao, hội thi sáng tạo Innogen, … với quy mô toàn Tập đoàn);
- Được tham dự các khóa đào tạo, hội thảo chuyên môn và phát triển năng lực do công ty và đối tác tổ chức.
Level: Giám Đốc và Cấp Cao Hơn

Title: Product Content Creator (Up-To $5000)
Company: Crossian Việt Nam
Location: Tầng 1, Pax Sky, 63-65 Ngô Thì Nhậm, Phường Phạm Đình Hổ, Quận Hai Bà Trưng, TP Hà Nội, Việt Nam, Tầng 5, Pax Sky, 63-65 Ngô Thì Nhậm, Phường Phạm Đình Hổ, Quận Hai Bà Trưng, TP Hà Nội, Việt Nam
Job Description:
ABOUT THE ROLE

Crossian is a fast-growing, technology-driven e-commerce business dedicated to building direct-to-consumer brands and maximizing customer lifetime value. Over the past three years, our talented team have fueled remarkable growth exceeding 1000%. We’re now seeking dynamic, next-generation leaders to drive our high-growth business forward.

As our Product Content Creator, you will shape the go-to-market strategy for our unique & innovative fashion products, work alongside talented teams, and use your analytical and creative skills to drive customer engagement and optimize performance. If you’re ready to take your career to the next level and play a key role in the growth of a forward-thinking e-commerce company, we want to hear from you!

WHO IS YOUR MENTOR?

1. Head of Marketing
2. Sale & Marketing Manager
3. Content Manager
4. Product Marketing Experts

CAREER ROADMAP

Step 1: Crossian Aptitude Test
Step 2: Interview
Step 3: 1-month Onboarding Program
Step 3.1: Knowledge training in D2C Business model, Acquisition Funnel & Management know-how
Step 3.2: Knowledge training in Product content creation framework & Product fit market approach
Step 3.3: Training in Product development life cycle
Step 3.4: Onjob
Step 4: Become a Product Marketing Specialist
Job Requirements:
WHAT WE ARE LOOKING FOR

Work experience:
- Track record of copywriting viral videos or building a personal/commercial brand presence on TikTok/Facebook
- Proven career advancement in digital/ product content marketing or holding an equivalent title in previous role(s)
- Strong understanding of market research, data analysis, and consumer behavior
- Experience in e-commerce or as a retail/ e-commerce shop owner is a plus

Skills:
- Video ideation and script writing. No direct filming or editing skills required.
- Strong command of English with contextual understanding to create compelling and audience-focused content
- Critical thinking and problem solving skills
- Research, task management and collaboration skills
- Presentation or training/ mentoring/ coaching skill is a plus

Other qualifications:
- Customer-centric and proactive mindset
- Aptitude for turning data into actionable insights
- Passion for continuous learning and professional development
- Ability to self-motivate and perform under pressure
- A keen eye for detail

WHAT YOU WILL DO

Market Research & Product Positioning
- Conduct comprehensive market research to identify product-market fit in the retail industry, analyzing customer preferences, industry trends, and competitor performance to enhance product offerings.
- Leverage data insights to ensure that our fashion products stand out in a competitive market and drive growth.

Go-to-Market Strategy & Execution
- Be the market guru, identifying US customer trends, consumer preferences, and competitor move
- Mastermind go-to-market product marketing strategy for our fashion products that keeps engagement high and conversions rolling in

Content Creation and Distribution
- Oversee the production of top-tier content, from viral video creatives to jaw-dropping websites
- Stay up-to-date with industry trends and best practices in product marketing, implementing innovative strategies to drive results

Analytics and Performance Optimization
- Keep a keen eye on digital content performance and metrics, optimizing for conversions
- Utilize data insights to identify areas for improvement and make data-driven decisions to optimize conversion rate

Cross-functional Collaboration
- Collaborate with Graphics and Video teams, and other creators to make visually impactful content
- Collaborate with in-house teams to make sure selected product features meet industry quality standards; marketing collaterals align with market trends and customer needs
- Collaborate with Performance Marketing team to track, analyze, and report on sales, advertising metrics and KPIs to measure marketing campaign effectiveness

WHAT YOU CAN EXPECT

At Crossian, our people are the key to our success. We believe in creating an attractive total compensation package (TCP) that not only retains employees but allows them to excel in their profession. These include:
- Well-trained program by our marketing experts, from technical skills by our seniors to soft skills by our team leads and managers
- Clear & transparent career development and promotion opportunities, excel to Product Marketing Manager position within 2-3 years
- Attractive salary, bonus, fair and transparent scheme, income up to $5000/month (basic salary up to $1000 depending on capacity)
- Full salary during probation
- 12 days work-from-home & 12 days of paid annual leave
- Global health insurance package for yourself
- Guaranteed 13th month salary
- Quarterly bonus & Year-end bonus as part of our profit sharing program
- A Pantry & a Crossian Cafe stocked with goodies, ready to serve
- Lots of other company benefits including 5-star annual Summer Summit, budget for frequent team building activities and other monthly / quarterly / annual company events
- General company T&D Program
- Other benefits in accordance to Company's Policy and Vietnam Labor Laws

Company: Crossian Việt Nam
Location: Tầng 1, Toà nhà Pax Sky, 63 - 65 phố Ngô Thì Nhậm, Phường Phạm Đình Hổ, Quận Hai Bà Trưng, Hà Nội, Tầng 1, Pax Sky, 63-65 Ngô Thì Nhậm, Phường Phạm Đình Hổ, Quận Hai Bà Trưng, TP Hà Nội, Việt Nam
Job Description:
ABOUT THE ROLE
Crossian is a high-growth technology-driven e-commerce business. Behind our success is our people. As a start-up formed in 2020, we have created a fast-paced and dynamic environment, enabling our people to reach a cumulative average growth rate of over 1000% in the last 3 years. Our mission now is to build direct-to-consumer brands and increase customer lifetime value. We are seeking a results-driven and strategically minded Project Manager with a proven track record in project management and operational excellence. In this role, you will take ownership of leading key initiatives, managing complex projects, and driving continuous improvements across our operations in product development. You will collaborate cross-functionally, utilizing data to define requirements and guide decision-making. Your ability to solve complex problems, lead cross-functional teams, and deliver high-quality outcomes under tight deadlines will be key to your success.

WHAT YOU WILL DO
1. Strategic Leadership in Operations
• Drive seasonal planning by aligning product roadmaps with team goals, market trends, and development calendars.
• Optimize operational processes to improve time-to-market, workflow, and resource allocation.
• Report progress and insights to upper management, providing data-driven updates and aligning team outputs with strategic business objectives.
2. Team Management
• Advise Project Coordinators in managing team tasks and workload based on project timelines, individual strengths, and capacity to prevent burnout and ensure excellence of deliverables.
• Facilitate communication and collaboration, ensuring designers and coordinators are aligned on project goals, milestones, and dependencies.
• Monitor team performance and morale, and maintain a productive, motivated working environment.
• Foster team development by mentoring junior members, providing regular feedback, and supporting skill growth.
3. Timeline & Risk Monitoring
• Supervise project timelines, mapping out all phases from concept to launch, including design, sampling, and production.
• Run regular check-ins and status reviews with Project Coordinators to monitor progress and bottlenecks.
• Mitigate risks proactively by identifying potential issues and creating scenario-based contingency plans to enable agile pivots without disrupting overall timelines or product quality.
4. Stakeholder Management
• Lead cross-team alignment between Product Development, Supply Chain, and Marketing teams to ensure Marketing’s go-to-market needs and SCE’s capacity planning are integrated early in development.
• Manage team priorities, operational constraints, and vendor capabilities into drive clear, actionable plans.
• Set up structured communication cadences (e.g., weekly cross-functional check-ins, milestone reviews) to ensure transparency and fast issue resolution.
5. Budget & Expense Management
• Plan and track project budgets across the product development cycles.
• Forecast and monitor expenses by category, flagging potential overruns and recommending adjustments.
• Identify cost-saving opportunities through design-for-cost strategies without compromising quality.
• Report budget status to stakeholders, connecting spending decisions to business outcomes.
Job Requirements:
WHAT WE ARE LOOKING FOR
Required Skills & Experience
• Bachelor's or Master’s degree in Project Management, Business Administration, Supply Chain Management or a related field.
• Minimum 3 years of team/project management experience, with proven track record in leading complex initiatives and driving operational excellence in a dynamic and fast-paced environment
• Strong interpersonal & communication skills, with ability to collaborate effectively with cross-functional teams (product development, marketing, manufacturing, etc.).
• Advanced problem-solving skills with the ability to think strategically and make data-driven decisions.
• Agile mindset, ability to work effectively within a diverse team, and adapting to changing priorities.
• Strong people management skills, with the ability to motivate and mentor a team toward operational excellence.
• Proficiency in Asana, Jira, Confluence, or other project management software.
• Proficiency in English communication.
Preferred Qualifications
• Professional qualification in Project Management (PMP, CAPM, etc.).
• Past industrial experience in fashion, retail, e-commerce, and manufacturing

WHAT YOU CAN EXPECT
At Crossian, our people are the key to our success. We believe in creating an attractive total compensation package (TCP) that not only retains employees but allows them to excel in their profession. These include:
• Competitive salary (negotiable depending on what you bring to the table)
• Full salary during probation
• 12 days of work-from-home & 12 days of paid annual leave
• Global health insurance package for yourself and direct family members
• Guaranteed 13th-month salary
• Quarterly bonus and year-end bonus as part of our profit-sharing program
• Chances to advance into a Program or Portfolio Manager position, driving cross-functional initiatives and delivering strategic value at scale
• A Pantry & a Crossian Cafe stocked with goodies, ready to serve
• Lots of other company benefits including a 5-star annual Summer Summit, budget for frequent team building activities, and other monthly/quarterly/annual company events
• General company T&D Program
• Other benefits in accordance with the Company's Policy and Vietnam Labor Laws

Title: Fashion Tech Pack Designer (US Market) - Up to 23 Months of Annual Salary
Company: Crossian Việt Nam
Location: Tầng 1, Pax Sky, 63-65 Ngô Thì Nhậm, Phường Phạm Đình Hổ, Quận Hai Bà Trưng, TP Hà Nội, Việt Nam, Tầng 5, Pax Sky, 63-65 Ngô Thì Nhậm, Phường Phạm Đình Hổ, Quận Hai Bà Trưng, TP Hà Nội, Việt Nam
Job Description:
ABOUT THE ROLE
Crossian is a high-growth technology-driven e-commerce business. Behind our success is our people. As a start-up formed in 2020, we have created a fast-paced and dynamic environment, enabling our people to reach a cumulative average growth rate of 900% in just under 4 years. Our mission now is to build DTC brands and increase customer LTV by providing best-valued products backed by no-nonsense customer service policies as Customer Centricity is at the core of our values.
We are seeking a skilled and detail-oriented Fashion Tech Pack Designer with specialized knowledge of bra/pants products to join our team. The Fashion Tech Pack Designer will develop tech packs for designated apparels, ensure technical accuracy, and deliver seamless execution from concept to production. They will collaborate closely with fashion, technical, and 3D designers to refine construction and materials. Additionally, they will review samples, troubleshoot technical challenges, and drive innovation by optimizing design processes and integrating new techniques. Strong problem-solving skills and a deep understanding of garment construction are essential for success in this role.

WHAT YOU WILL DO
Tech Pack Creation & Process Improvement
• Create detailed, production-ready tech packs for designated apparel, ensuring accuracy in proportions, stitch details, construction notes, material items and grading, etc.
• Ensure tech packs align with original design intent and are structured for easy interpretation by manufacturers and suppliers.
• Utilize expertise in garment construction and trim functionality to ensure high-quality product execution.
• Collaborate with sourcing specialists, technical designers, and manufacturers to refine product specifications and ensure seamless development.
• Stay up to date with innovations in materials, construction techniques, and industry trends to enhance working process, product performance, comfort, and aesthetics.
Sample Production & Evaluation
• Review and update all tech pack details before moving to the sampling stage to minimize errors in production.
• Review product fitting and provide clear and actionable feedback regarding measurement, construction quality, and overall workmanship.
• Support production team to troubleshoot technical challenges and ensure the final product meets quality standards and aesthetic goals.
Collaboration & Communication
• Manage multiple design projects at the same time, ensuring timely delivery under tight timelines and quality standards.
• Work closely with the product development team to conceptualize and refine new designs.
• Review and evaluate 3D designs for accuracy and quality, providing feedback for necessary revisions.
Job Requirements:
WHAT WE ARE LOOKING FOR
Required
• Specialized knowledge of BRA/PANTS products, including design principles, fit, and functionality.
• Engineer’s/Bachelor’s/Associate degree in Textile & Garment Technology, Technical Design, Fashion Design or a related field.
• At least 3 years of proven experience as a Technical Designer, Tech Pack Designer, or Fashion Designer with a robust portfolio showcasing past products’ tech packs. Candidates should have at least 1.5 year specific experience with bra/pants products.
• Ability to visualize full garment designs and identify potential risks.
• In-depth knowledge of Adobe Illustrator and Photoshop.
• Excellent visualization skills, with a keen eye for detail, color coordination, and style trends.
• Strong interpersonal and communication skills & ability to collaborate effectively with cross-functional teams.
• Ability to thrive in a fast-paced environment and adapt to changing design requirements.
• Strong English communication skills.
Preferred
• Advanced skills in other design software.
• Knowledge of 3D fitting and basic knowledge of pattern making/reviewing.

WHAT YOU CAN EXPECT
At Crossian, our people are the key to our success. We believe in creating an attractive total compensation package (TCP) that not only retains employees but allows them to excel in their profession. These include:
• Competitive salary (negotiable depending on what you bring to the table)
• Full salary during probation
• 12 days of work-from-home & 12 days of paid annual leave
• Global health insurance package for yourself and direct family members
• Guaranteed 13th-month salary
• Quarterly bonus and year-end bonus as part of our profit-sharing program
• A Pantry & a Crossian Cafe stocked with goodies, ready to serve
• Lots of other company benefits including a 5-star annual Summer Summit, budget for frequent team building activities, and other monthly/quarterly/annual company events
• General company T&D Program
• Other benefits in accordance with the Company's Policy and Vietnam Labor Laws.

Title: Senior Financial Analyst (750M to 1.35B VND Per Year)
Company: Crossian Việt Nam
Location: Hà Nội, Vietnam, Tầng 1, Pax Sky, 63-65 Ngô Thì Nhậm, Phường Phạm Đình Hổ, Quận Hai Bà Trưng, TP Hà Nội, Việt Nam
Job Description:
ABOUT THE ROLE
Crossian is a high-growth technology-driven e-commerce business. Behind our success is our people. As a start-up formed in 2020, we have created a fast-paced and dynamic environment, enabling our people to reach a cumulative average growth rate of over 1000% in the last 3 years. Our mission now is to build direct-to-consumer brands and increase customer LTV.
We are looking for a detail-oriented Senior Financial Analyst to oversee financial planning and analysis. Key responsibilities include managing cash flow forecasts, performing financial forecasting, tracking KPIs, and evaluating performance against budgets. The ideal candidate will offer insights to support executive decision-making and ensure compliance. If you have at least five years of financial analysis experience and strong Excel skills, we want you! Read on to learn more about this opportunity!
WHAT YOU WILL DO
Planning and Forecasting
• Cash Flow Planning: Manage cash flow forecasts, ensuring accuracy and alignment with the overall financial strategy.
• Financial Forecasting: Forecast monthly, quarterly, semi-annual, and annual profits, providing detailed analysis, feedback, and recommendations to the executive management to support strategic decision-making.
Performance Analysis and Monitoring
• Monitoring Key Performance Indicators (KPIs): Track and analyze critical KPIs, preparing comprehensive financial reports.
• Financial Control: Evaluate and control financial indicators, providing analysis and commentary to be included in the monthly business performance reports.
• Revenue and Profit Reporting: Monitor and interpret revenue, profit, and contribution performance against budget, prior performance, and current market conditions.
• Actual Results Analysis: Compare actual results with forecasts to analyze strengths, weaknesses, and opportunities for improvement.
• Process Review & Improvement: Conduct process reviews and optimize performance through in-depth data analysis.
Risk Control
• KYC (Know Your Customer) Risk Management: Ensure that all accounts are properly managed and compliant with KYC requirements to minimize legal risks and ensure regulatory compliance.
• Cash Flow Risk Management: Monitor and assess risks related to cash flow to ensure that financial operations do not encounter liquidity issues or other financial risks.
• Tax Risk Management: Analyze and manage tax-related risks, ensuring compliance with current tax regulations and optimizing tax strategies to minimize costs.
• Other Financial Risks: Evaluate other potential financial risks, including but not limited to internal and external financial issues, and provide recommendations to mitigate these risks.
• Accounting Records Review: Review accounting entries to ensure the accuracy of financial report data.
Other Duties
• Perform Special Tasks: Carry out additional tasks and reporting as requested by management.
Job Requirements:
WHAT WE ARE LOOKING FOR
• Educational Background: Bachelor’s degree or Master’s in Finance, Finance & Accounting, Corporate Finance, Economics, Business, or related field.
• Minimum of 7 years of direct experience in financial analysis, financial planning, analysis, modeling, or a similar role.
• Strong critical thinking and analytical skills, and problem-solving abilities.
• Experience in the e-commerce market and or fast growth retail company with revenue over US $100M will be considered an asset.
• Prior accounting and international work experience are considered an asset.
• High proficiency in MS Office, especially Excel (advanced level). Knowledge of BI tools is an advantage.
• Ability to quickly learn new concepts, attention to detail, and effectiveness in a high-pressure environment.
• Strong communication skills (both written and verbal)
• Language: Good command of English four skills (equivalent to IELTS 7.0++ or TOEIC 850++) as you will be working with international partners.
WHAT YOU CAN EXPECT
At Crossian, our people are the key to our success. We believe in creating an attractive total compensation package (TCP) that not only retains employees but allows them to excel in their profession. These include:
• Total Compensation Package (750M - 1.35B VND per year)
• Monthly Salary Range: 25-45M VND (depending on experience)
• Bonuses: Average 18 months performance and annual bonuses per year
• Full salary during probation
• Global health insurance, Training & Development budget, Team building budget, 5-star company events, 12 days Work-from-home allowance & much more.
• Other benefits in accordance with the Company's Policy and Vietnam Labor Law.

Job Description:

- Lead the annual budgeting process and provide regular forecasting updates to Board of Director
- Work closely with department heads to develop and monitor departmental budgets

- Oversee cash flow management
- Identifying potential risks and developing strategies to mitigate them

- Develop the internal processes, financial systems, and monitoring systems for key business risks
5. Team Leadership
- Manage and mentor a team of accountants and financial analysts
- Collaborate with cross-functional teams to ensure alignment on financial objectives
6. Systems & Process Improvement
- Improve the financial systems, processes, and reporting tools
- Implement financial software solutions to improve accuracy and efficiency of reporting
- Establish data quality and control mechanisms
- Create documentation standards and procedures

- Bachelor or Master degree in Finance, Accounting, and Professional certifications (e.g., CPA, CMA, ACCA)

- Must be fluent in English
- High proficiency in Microsoft Office Suite (Excel, Word, Powerpoint) and Finance/ Accounting Software (MISA, ERP, Fast)
- Experience in F&B and Hospitality industry is a required

Title: Chuyên Viên Xây Dựng Quy Trình Và Kiểm Soát Tuân Thủ
Company: Công Ty TNHH Bán Lẻ Fujimart Việt Nam
Location: Tầng 6, 51 Lê Đại Hành, Hai Bà Trưng, HN, Tầng 6, 51 Phố Lê Đại Hành, Quận Hai Bà Trưng, Thành phố Hà Nội
Job Description:
Tổ chức triển khai xây dựng hệ thống quy trình, quy định
- Phối hợp với các bộ phận triển khai xây dựng hệ thống quy trình, quy định thông qua việc phân tích chức năng - nhiệm vụ của từng phòng ban, vị trí công việc tại từng thời điểm
- Ban hành tài liệu mẫu đối với tất cả các hệ thống tài liệu mà Công ty cần ban hành: Quy trình, quy định, hướng dẫn, tiêu chuẩn….nhằm nhất quán trong toàn công ty đối với từng loại tài liệu ban hành.
- Kiểm tra, thẩm định tài liệu do các bộ phận ban hành nhằm đảm bảo tính đúng đắn của form mẫu và logic của nội dung cũng như phòng ngừa rủi ro tối đa đối với từng hoạt động
- Trực tiếp soạn thảo các quy trình, quy định áp dụng chung cho tất cả các bộ phận, các tài liệu thuộc nhiệm vụ của bộ phận Kiểm soát tuân thủ, quy trình quản lý

Phổ biến, hướng dẫn áp dụng
- Xây dựng tài liệu hướng dẫn đối với các quy trình, quy định đã ban hành
- Tổ chức đào tạo, giải thích tài liệu cho các bộ phận/cá nhân liên quan
- Trình duyệt, phổ biến và ban hành tài liệu đã được phê duyệt
- Lưu trữ và cung cấp tài liệu cho các phòng, ban, bộ phận khi có yêu cầu

Giám sát tuân thủ
- Xây dựng kế hoạch đánh giá nội bộ nhằm kiểm soát thực hiện thông qua hồ sơ lưu trữ của các phòng ban, bộ phận
- Xây dựng kế hoạch đánh giá, check list nhằm kiểm soát tuân thủ các quy trình, quy định thông qua hành động hàng ngày của các phòng, ban

Cải tiến và update quy trình, quy định
- Xây dựng quy trình, quy định cải tiến hệ thống tài liệu đã ban hành
- Xây dựng và triển khai kế hoạch đánh giá sự phù hợp và kế hoạch cải tiến tối thiểu 1 lần/năm

Báo cáo Công việc khác
- Báo cáo vi phạm được cập nhật tháng, quý, năm và gửi đến các cấp có thẩm quyền, các bộ phận liên quan trước ngày 10 hàng tháng
- Phân tích báo cáo và đề xuất các phương án cải thiện tình trạng vi phạm
- Gửi các báo cáo cho Trưởng bộ phận đúng thời hạn quy định, đủ số lượng báo cáo, chính sác về số liệu, đúng biểu mẫu
- Thực hiện các công việc khác theo yêu cầu của Quản lý trực tiếp
Job Requirements:
- Tốt nghiệp đại học trở lên
- Nắm vững nghiệp vụ xây đựng quy trình và các tiêu chuẩn, tài liệu pháp luật liên quan đến xây dụng quy trình trong doanh nghiệp
- Nắm được và hiểu về lĩnh vực bán lẻ, bao gồm các các quy định pháp luật liên quan đến lĩnh vực hoạt động kinh doanh chuỗi bán lẻ hàng tiêu dùng
- Nắm được các quy định pháp luật khác liên quan đến lĩnh vực hoạt động của Công ty.
- Kinh nghiệm làm việc tại vị trí tương tự từ 7 năm trở lên ở các Công ty sản xuất hoặc chuỗi bán lẻ
- Thành thạo tin văn phòng và các ứng dụng CNTT liên quan để phục vụ công việc, đặc biệt các phần mềm xây dựng quy trình
- Kỹ năng lập báo cáo, kế hoạch và quản ý kế hoạch để đạt mục tiêu tốt
- Tư duy phân tích tổng hợp tốt
- Giao tiếp tốt, tự tin và thuyết phục
- Sẵn sàng và nhiệt huyết với nhiệm vụ được giao
- Trung thực, tận tâm và luôn hợp tác
- Cầu tiến, có tinh thần học hỏi để phát triển cá nhân.

Thời gian làm việc:
- Từ thứ 2 - thứ 6: 8h - 12h & 13h - 17h
- Thứ 7: 8h - 12h
- Nghỉ: Chiều thứ 7; Chủ nhật

Nơi làm việc: Văn phòng Công ty tại tầng 6 số 51 Lê Đại Hành, Hai Bà Trưng, Hà Nội

CHẾ ĐỘ PHÚC LỢI:
- Lương theo thỏa thuận theo năng lực và kinh nghiệm.
- Xét tăng lương 1 năm/ lần theo cấp quản lý đánh giá
- Thưởng tháng lương thứ 13, thưởng các ngày lễ của Việt Nam, thưởng các ngày lễ cho con em CBNV.
- Chế độ phúc lợi: Đóng BHXH full lương. Hưởng đầy đủ các chế độ khác theo quy định của Luật lao động, và các chế độ phúc lợi khác theo quy định Công ty.
- Được làm việc và được đào tạo bởi các chuyên gia vận hành siêu thị đến từ Nhật.
- Tham quan nghỉ mát 1 lần/năm.

Title: Senior Online Advertising & PR Executive
Company: Lotte Mall West Lake Hanoi
Location: LOTTE MALL West Lake Hanoi, 683 Lạc Long Quân, Phú Thượng, Tây Hồ, Hà Nội, Lotte Mall West Lake Hanoi, 683 Lạc Long Quân, Phú Thượng, Tây Hồ, Hà Nội
Job Description:
Lotte Mall West Lake Hanoi is seeking a Marketing Executive to be responsible for developing and executing online advertising campaigns and managing public relations activities to enhance the company's brand visibility, engagement, and reputation across multiple digital platforms and media outlets.

Key Responsibilities:

1. Online Advertising (50%)
- Develop creative ideas and detailed advertising plans for promotional campaigns aligned with the overall marketing strategy.
- Manage and execute digital marketing activities across multiple channels, including Facebook, Instagram, YouTube, Website, Email, Google Ads, Display Networks, etc.
- Create content plans (including visuals, copywriting, viral clips, etc.) tailored for each online platform.
- Collaborate with KOLs, bloggers, influencers, media agencies, and publishers for branding, promotional campaigns, and offline event support.
- Track, analyze, and report the performance of all digital campaigns, providing insights and suggestions for improvement.
- Stay updated with the latest marketing trends to propose innovative advertising channels and campaign strategies.
- Review business cooperation contracts and coordinate payment processes with partners/agencies.

2. PR Activities (40%)
- Utilize effective media channels to enhance the visibility of the company’s brand.
- Ensure accurate and timely dissemination of company information across media platforms.
- Respond to media inquiries and build/maintain strong relationships with the press and media outlets.
- Monitor media channels to ensure no crisis or misinformation related to the company arises.

3. Other Tasks (10%)
- Support the Marketing Team with additional tasks as assigned by the Marketing Manager.
Job Requirements:
Qualifications:
- Bachelor’s degree in Marketing, Communications, Public Relations, or a related field.
- At least 2 years of experience in relevant role; Experience in influencer/KOL collaboration and social media
- Strong communication and relationship-building skills with media and external partners.
- Proactive, creative, detail-oriented, and able to manage multiple projects simultaneously.
- Fluent in Business English

What We Can Offer:
- Competitive salary package, open for negotiation: Salary, allowance, 13th month bonus salary, quarterly bonus, annual performance bonus, annual salary review
- Training & development: Personal development course, professional training course, rotation opportunities within subsidiaries
- 15 paid-leave annually; Social, Health, Unemployment insurance in accordance to Labor Law
- Health care scheme: PVI Health insurance; Annual health check
- Caring & Sharing: Wedding, Child birth, Funeral, Full Moon, Women Day, Lunar New Year, Children Day...
- Lunch/Dinner at canteen; Free motorbike parking; Perdiem for Business Trip; Team building Activities

• Xây dựng chiến lược kinh doanh và kế hoạch bán hàng để đạt mục tiêu doanh số của trung tâm.

• Quản lý đội ngũ kinh doanh, điều phối và phân bổ chỉ tiêu bán hàng, hướng dẫn và đào tạo kỹ năng bán hàng cho nhân viên.

• Nghiên cứu thị trường, phân tích xu hướng, xác định đối thủ cạnh tranh, từ đó đưa ra giải pháp tăng cường năng lực cạnh tranh của trung tâm.

• Xây dựng và triển khai các chương trình khuyến mãi, sự kiện đặc biệt để thu hút khách hàng và tăng cường nhận diện thương hiệu.

B. Quản lý Hoạt động Trung tâm:

• Giám sát và đảm bảo các hoạt động trong trung tâm diễn ra hiệu quả, đúng quy trình và an toàn.

• Đảm bảo chất lượng trải nghiệm học tập cho trẻ em trong tất cả các phòng chức năng (phòng robotic, phòng thiên hà, phòng khoa học diệu kỳ, v.v.).

• Quản lý cơ sở vật chất, kiểm tra định kỳ các thiết bị công nghệ và dụng cụ học tập, đảm bảo chúng luôn trong trạng thái tốt nhất.

C. Phát triển Quan hệ Khách hàng:

• Tạo dựng và duy trì mối quan hệ lâu dài với khách hàng hiện tại và khách hàng tiềm năng, đặc biệt là các trường học và phụ huynh trong khu vực.

• Thu thập và xử lý ý kiến khách hàng, tìm hiểu nhu cầu của phụ huynh và học sinh để cải tiến chương trình và dịch vụ của trung tâm.

• Xây dựng và duy trì mối quan hệ với các đối tác địa phương, từ đó mở rộng mạng lưới tiếp cận cho trung tâm.

D. Quản lý Nhân sự:

• Tuyển dụng, đào tạo và phát triển đội ngũ nhân viên tại trung tâm, từ nhân viên tư vấn đến giáo viên hướng dẫn.

• Thiết lập và duy trì môi trường làm việc tích cực, khuyến khích sự sáng tạo và nhiệt huyết của nhân viên.

• Đánh giá và giám sát hiệu quả công việc của đội ngũ, đề xuất các biện pháp cải tiến khi cần thiết.
Job Requirements:
• Trình độ: Tốt nghiệp đại học, ưu tiên các ngành liên quan đến quản trị kinh doanh, marketing, giáo dục hoặc các lĩnh vực tương đương.

• Kinh nghiệm: Có ít nhất 3-5 năm ở vị trí tương đương hoặc đã có kinh nghiệm quản lý chi nhánh/ quản lý các trung tâm giáo dục.

• Kỹ năng:

- Kỹ năng quản lý đội nhóm, lãnh đạo và phát triển nhân viên.

- Kỹ năng giao tiếp, thuyết phục và chăm sóc khách hàng.

- Kỹ năng lập kế hoạch và quản lý thời gian tốt, chịu được áp lực công việc cao.

• Kiến thức: Hiểu biết về thị trường giáo dục, đặc biệt là giáo dục STEAM là một lợi thế.

• Khả năng: Có khả năng sáng tạo, linh hoạt trong tư duy và thích ứng nhanh với môi trường làm việc.


Quyền lợi ứng viên
- Mức lương hấp dẫn từ 20,000,000 - 30,000,000 VNĐ/tháng dựa trên năng lực và kinh nghiệm.
- Các khoản thưởng dựa trên hiệu suất kinh doanh và doanh số của chi nhánh.
- Được tham gia các khóa đào tạo nâng cao kỹ năng, cơ hội thăng tiến trong tập đoàn.
- Chương trình chăm sóc sức khỏe dành riêng cho cấp quản lý.

Title: Buyer
Company: Spartronics Vietnam
Location: KCN Nam Tân Uyên, Khánh Bình, Tân Uyên, Bình Dương, Việt Nam, Lot A, Nam Tan Uyen IP, Tan Uyen Town, Binh Duong
Job Description:
PURPOSE OF THIS POSITION:
Responsible for obtaining materials to meet master production schedules. Coordinates all purchasing activities with planning, engineering, IQC and program management to balance customer requirements, inventory levels, product quality and cost.
PRIMARY RESPONSIBILITIES:
- Release purchasing orders to suppliers based on Lead time, MOQ/SPQ, system demand by weekly.
- Work out supplier delivery schedule and monitor suppliers delivery on time. In order to make sure no material shortage in production line.
- Control suppliers manufacturing lead time, processes, capabality, raw material, and identify the risk and solution in advance.
- Control Inventory: Maintain proper inventory level and minimum the excess material if any order cancellation.
- Report for Excess & Obsolete (E&O) material by monthly with proposal action. Work with cross functional team for action to clear the E&O.
- Control engineer change order (ECO) to cut off old stock and ram up new item.
- To confirm the schedule follow customer request (new order (MR)/Pull-push/Cancel/Swap POs).
- Analyze the material expedition option and propose solution.
- Materials lead-time analysis and propose the long lead time items to get customer approval to buy in advance.
- Be the contact points to resolve quality, delivery & all of issues of materials with suppliers for assigned projects.
- Monitor and improve supplier performance (on time delivery) to scale with the growth of the business.
- Take actions on actions messages (postpone, cancel) from weekly ERP system to minimize excess stock of raw material for assigned projects.
- Responsible for targeted material cost savings of the assigned projects.
- Do the Cost Bill of Material (CBOM) for current project and new project.
- Participate in other activities as required.
- Other jobs as assigned.
Job Requirements:
REQUIREMENTS:
Education: Bachelor’s degree or master’s degree in business or related field.
Experience: Minimum of 3 years’ experience in electronics company, understand electronics categories and minimum of 2 years working experience at the same level.
Others:
- Working knowledge of computerized system required.
- Good command in English both writing and speaking.
- Good negotiation, excellent communication skill.
- Have understanding of supply chain base, especially in the electronic components market.
- Have good understanding of Incoterms & general Customs regulation/requirement of a processing company.

At Irvine Construction Cost Accounting, an America-based tax and accounting firm, we mentor and train new graduates/fresh candidates to become skilled general accountants. - Maintain accurate records of financial transactions.
- Reconcile transactions into accounting systems utilizing Best Practices of the accounting industry.
- Engage in email communication with American clients to clarify any transaction-related matters.
- Acquire expertise in advanced accounting principles to support specialized industries within corporate America.

- Graduates majoring in Accounting - Finance, Economics from domestic and international universities.
- Candidates with experience in financial accounting in domestic and international companies would take precedence.

- Great communication and interpersonal skills.
- Effective time management and organizational skills.
– Pride in the quality of your work.

Title: Electrical & Instrumentation Engineer
Company: Fico Tay Ninh Cement Joint Stock Company (Fico-YTL)
Location: HCM office, 26th floor - Etown Central Tower, 11 Doan Van Bo Str., Ward 13, Dist.4, HCMC
Job Description:
In this position, you will based in Technical Department in Head Office (HCMC) for project preparation & planning work and cement plant in Tay Ninh for long overnight business trips on Monday to Friday during project execution. You will be responsible for the project planning and project management activities of Electrical and Instrumentation system for cement plant upgrading and expansion projects within Fico-YTL. You will be involved in end-to-end project management and engaging with various stakeholders from project initiation to completion to ensure timely and successful project delivery to end-users.
Duties and Responsibilities:
1. Supervise the installation and commissioning works of electrical & control system to ensure the project deliverables are met with schedule, quality, safety and comply to local authorities
2. Design the electrical - control systems for upgrading and expansion works.
3. Create BOM (bill of materials), BOQ (Bill of quantities) based on analysis design drawings, shop drawings and coordinate with relevant departments for execution.
4. Witnessing Factory Assembly Test (FAT)
5. Manage electrical engineering office desk works and project documentation required by authorities, operation & maintenance, including site dossier, inspection reports and acceptance dossier.
6. Comply with Company’s procedures and policies
Job Requirements:
• Minimum a Bachelor’s Degree in Electrical Engineering.
• Open to fresh graduates; candidates with up to 3 years of relevant experience are also encouraged to apply
• Knowledge in cement production process is an advantage.
• Ability to read and understand electrical - control system design drawings, shop drawing from suppliers.
• Able to use AutoCad / Eplan for electrical/control design and proficient in using Autocad, MS Office.
• Willing to go on long overnight business trips within Vietnam for project execution works especially Tay Ninh and Binh Duong.
• Able to converse and write in Vietnamese and English.
• Process good interpersonal skills and communication skills to manage site activities.
• Possess good and positive work attitude & morality and possess ability to multi-task and work systematically.
Keyword: Fico Tay Ninh Cement Joint Stock Company (Fico-YTL)
